review: Overall, we're pretty satisfied with the Fire Stick. Setup is easy and the menu is intuitive. The remote works well although I wish I could control it with my Logitech Universal remote. I have experienced some hesitation and "crashes" while watching a movie. It's only happened during one movie and I hope it's the only time it'll happen.
author: pubprof

review: I found the picture misleading and did not realize it required plugging a power cable into the stick for it to work. For most people with a flat screen on wall that means running an additional cable.
